Several of the answers here I believe are incorrect, because the question is not asking who was the most hateful against Iranians but rather who was the most hateful among Iranians i.e- which Iranian has been the most hateful throughout Iranian history. The first person that came to mind was Davud Monshizadeh:  He was an Iranian Neo-Nazi who fought in the the SS during the Battle of Berlin. Prior to that he was a member of the NSDAP. After the war ended, he created SUMKA, an Iranian Neo-Nazi party that expressed extreme hatred against Arabs and Jews. The party never gained serious power though it was still terrifying in the sense that it almost a complete copy of the NSDAP’s beliefs.  There is no evidence to suggest that he took part in the holocaust, though he is certainly one of Iran’s worst citizens. —Further reading:— Davud Monshizadeh - Wikipedia SUMKA - Wikipedia
